title.narrative: Strengthening accountability to affected populations through independent perception monitoring in Burkina Faso

description.narrative: Affected people’s perceptions of humanitarian ongoing response of COVID-19

Objectives are to obtain regular, actionable information from affected people about how they perceive implementation of the ongoing response in Burkina Faso, and the shift to the COVID-19 response, as the basis for performance monitoring and course correction

Target are people affected by the humanitarian crisis and COV crisis. It targets two of the five affected regions in Burkina Faso (Boucle du Mouhoun, Centre-Nord, Nord, Sahel, and Est) which are Centre Nord and Sahel.
Sample size 400 (telephonic) and 400 (in person) for data collection on region Centre Nord and Sahel

Expense for H2H Burkina Faso for Jun - Oct 2020
(SGA ref: H2H_2020_BF2_GTS)
